## Load Dependencies
```{r}
library(renv)
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
```

## Load in Data
```{r}
raw <- read_csv("data/usa_county_wise.csv")
head(raw)
```

## Filter to counties with county level
```{r}
raw <- raw |>
  filter(nchar(FIPS) == 5)

head(raw)
```

## Convert Date Column
```{r}
raw <- raw |>
  mutate(Date = as.Date(Date, format = "%m/%d/%y"))
```

## Calculate Incidence
```{r}
raw <- raw |>
  group_by(FIPS) |>
  arrange(Date) |>
  mutate(Incidence = Confirmed - lag(Confirmed, default = 0)) |>
  mutate(Incidence = ifelse(is.na(Incidence) | Incidence < 0, 0, Incidence)) |>
  ungroup()
```

## Visualize Data
```{r}
raw |>
  ggplot(aes(x = Date, y = Confirmed, group = FIPS)) +
  geom_line(alpha = 0.1) +
  theme_minimal()
```
